thread.title: ANGELA
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by ANGELA

author: ANGELA
title: ANGELA
text: I have a habit of turning up at cairns airport without my licence with an expiring licence without a booking or just plain disorganised. I also have a habit of spilling drinks in the car. Nothing is too much trouble for these guys to sort out! They plug in my phone, let me take the car with a emailed photo of my license or on one ocasion with an expiring license and a promise to send through the renewal! I once booked with a different company but found they were too strict to handle my disorganisation so i went back to reddot and they matched the price and bent the rules for me yet again! Love these guys. The customer service is fantastic for a busy and overtired business woman!
